Chap. 126 - To A. T. Jones

                                Preston, Melbourne, Australia, Sept. 2, 1892 
Dear Brother A. T. Jones,--- 


     I send with this a letter written to Elder U. Smith; for I have felt pained to see differences appear in the REVIEW AND HERALD, publishing to the world the want of unity among Seventh-day Adventists. It is essential that we present a united front. The light given me for many years from the Lord has been, Let not conflicting sentiments be published in our church paper.
